name: Yoga
description: Yoga offers physical and mental health benefits. Yoga can become an integral part of your treatment and potentially hasten healing.

name: Lifting Weights
description: Weight Lifting uses the force of gravity in the form of weighted bars, dumbbells or weight stacks in order to oppose the force.

name: Aerobic Exercise
description: Aerobic exercise is performed by repeating sequences of light-to-moderate intensity activities for extended periods of time.

name: Plank
description: There are many benefits of planking as planks are an excellent abdominal and core exercise.

name: Pilates
description: Pilates is a form of exercise which concentrates on strengthening the body with an emphasis on core strength.

name: Pushup
description: Pushups are a simple and effective bodyweight movement that can help increase strength in your upper body and core.

name: Martial Arts
description: Martial arts are systems of combat practiced for self-defense; military and law enforcement applications; physical, mental development.

name: Squats
description: A squat is a strength exercise in which the trainee lowers their hips from a standing position and then stands back up.

name: Swimming
description: Swimming is an individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.
